title: Israel Money Supply M2
description: Money Supply M2 in Israel increased to 1397990.40 ILS Million in August from 1382673.30 ILS Million in July of 2022. Money Supply M2 in Israel averaged 314944.33 ILS Million from 1981 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1397990.40 ILS Million in August of 2022 and a record low of 12.40 ILS Million in April of 1981. Israel Money Supply M2 includes M1 plus short-term time deposits in banks. This page provides - Israel Money Supply M2 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Israel
